DOC.brief_summary: METHODS : Subjects : All internal medicine ( IM ) , emergency medicine ( EM ) , anesthesia ( A ) , surgery ( S ) resident hospital ICU nurse ( approximately 400 subject ) undergo evaluation training CPR technique accord department training policy . Subjects score observer base previously describe assessment tool video record . - Phase II : All study subject complete phase I assessment undergo standardized debrief demonstration proper CPR technique review individual baseline videotape follow repeat demonstration CPR techniques clinical scenario cardiopulmonary arrest simulation lab .
